reviews.title: 3D Visualization
reviews.text: I run a 3D visualization business and previously relied only on recommendations. After several slow months without leads, I turned to Advantage. In a short time, they helped me create an effective cold outreach system targeting key decision-makers. We even hired additional managers to handle new leads!
reviews.author: Justin Clark

reviews.title: Auto Detailing
reviews.text: I own a small auto detailing franchise üöÄ. Stepan from Advantage showed us compelling numbers and we decided to try online marketing. We launched campaigns on YouTube, TikTok, Meta, and Google Search, and the results exceeded all expectations. Our new business doubled in just 4.5 months!
reviews.author: Brian Foster

reviews.title: E-commerce
reviews.text: My furniture online store faced tough competition üí™. Advantage developed a comprehensive strategy that included sales funnel optimization and targeted advertising. In 3 months, our sales grew by 180%.
reviews.author: Sofia Melnyk

reviews.title: Consulting
reviews.text: Our consulting firm was looking for ways to expand its client base üìà. The Advantage team proposed a unique LinkedIn marketing strategy. Result: 45 new B2B clients in the first 6 months.
reviews.author: Oleg Kovalchuk

reviews.title: Online Coaching
reviews.text:
I initially worked with Instagram producers to promote my online coaching program ‚≠ê. They were responsible for content, advertising, webinars, and overall social media presence.

Over 4 months, I spent $17,000 on Facebook ads, but the result was negative. Although I spoke with Advantage before partnering with producers, I somehow chose a different path.

After the unsuccessful experience, I turned to Advantage, and they exceeded all expectations! The team generated 5 times more leads compared to previous results. Now I see real business growth.
reviews.author: Mary Hudson

reviews.title: Restaurant
reviews.text: Our fast-food restaurant chain needed to increase foot traffic. Advantage developed a local advertising campaign that led to a 75% increase in attendance. Their attention to detail and constant campaign optimization was particularly impressive.
reviews.author: Maria Petrenko

reviews.title: SaaS Company
reviews.text: As a SaaS company, we faced the challenge of high customer acquisition costs. Advantage proposed an innovative approach to content marketing and PPC, which reduced our CAC by 40% while increasing conversion.
reviews.author: Victor Lysenko

reviews.title: Educational Project
reviews.text: Our online courses needed increased reach. Advantage developed a comprehensive strategy using various channels. In 4 months, the number of students tripled, and acquisition costs decreased by 35%.
reviews.author: Anna Vasylenko

reviews.title: Crisis Period
reviews.text: During the economic downturn, our business needed a new marketing strategy. Advantage not only helped us maintain positions but also find new growth opportunities. Their adaptability and strategic thinking helped us emerge from the crisis stronger.
reviews.author: Igor Romanenko

reviews.title: Traditional Business
reviews.text: Our traditional business needed digital transformation. The Advantage team guided us through the entire process, from strategy creation to implementation. The results exceeded expectations: 250% growth in online sales in six months. Thank you!
reviews.author: Dmytro Kovalenko

questions.question: How much will it cost for me?
questions.answer: It depends on the complexity of the project and the number of marketing tools needed for your case. You can get a personalized offer during our call.

questions.question: Which advertising channel should I choose?
questions.answer: No need to worry about this, during the call we will analyze your case down to the smallest details, give you a clear understanding of how your competitors advertise, and help you make a decision.

questions.question: Is it safe for me?
questions.answer: We are a British company with a branch in Poland. Before starting work, we sign a cooperation agreement that clearly outlines the scope of work and obligations of both parties.

questions.question: When will I see results?
questions.answer: Each project requires different time to achieve results. On average, return on investment occurs in the 2-3rd month of work.

slide1.title: FROM ‚Ç¨999
slide1.subtitle: How does targeted advertising work?
content: Users browse Facebook and Instagram feeds, and our ads are shown to them at the right moment.

Thanks to Meta algorithms and artificial intelligence, advertising finds your audience through analysis of interests and keywords that users speak near their smartphone, increasing the chance of getting leads or purchases.

list.title: 1. Experience in Various Niches
list.description: We've worked with a wide range of businesses and generated tens of thousands of leads and sales for our clients.

list.title: 2. Clear Work Structure

slide3.content: Want such results? Get a free strategy

slide1.title: FROM ‚Ç¨999
slide1.subtitle: How does search advertising work?
content: Users search for products and services on Google, and your ad appears in top search positions at the exact moment when the client is ready to buy.
Thanks to precise keywords and user intent targeting, your ads reach people actively searching for your services, which ensures high conversion rates.

list.title: 1. Certified Specialists
list.description: Our team has all necessary certifications and years of experience with Google Ads.

list.title: 2. Full Range of Tools
list.description: We utilize all Google ecosystem capabilities: search, display ads, YouTube, and remarketing.

list.title: 3. Competitive Analysis
list.description: We thoroughly study your competitors in search and implement the most effective strategies.

list.title: 4. Precise Targeting
list.description: We work with negative keywords, geo-targeting, and ad scheduling for maximum budget efficiency.

list.title: 5. Detailed Analytics
list.description: We set up detailed analytics to track all calls, leads, and sales.

list.title: 6. Transparent Reporting

list.title: Proven Results
list.description: Want to get hot leads from search? Get a free audit

slide3.content: Want to get hot leads from search? Get a free audit

slide1.title: FROM ‚Ç¨999
slide1.subtitle: What is a landing page?
content: It's a single-page website specifically designed to attract clients, present services, or sell products. It's focused on achieving one specific goal ‚Äì generating leads or sales.
Thanks to proper structure, unique design, and strong copywriting, a landing page can significantly increase your advertising conversion rate.

slide2.subtitle: Why choose us for your landing page?

list.title: 1. Sales Funnels
list.description: We design pages that naturally guide clients towards making a purchase.

list.title: 2. Analytics
list.description: We implement special tools that show how visitors interact with your site to optimize it.

list.title: 3. CRO Optimization
list.description: We continuously improve your landing page to achieve maximum conversion.

list.title: 4. Custom Solutions
list.description: We create websites without builder limitations, allowing us to implement any functionality.

list.title: 5. Responsiveness
list.description: Your site will work perfectly on any device.

list.title: 6. Speed
list.description: We guarantee fast loading for user convenience.

list.title: 7. Free Hosting
list.description: We provide free hosting for your pages.

slide3.content: Our landing pages are perfect for advertising and deliver results. Order development and get a tool that sells.

content.0: Your target audience receives an email in their inbox that motivates them to move further along the sales or partnership funnel.
content.1: We set up mass mailing that reaches a large volume of potential clients while ensuring delivery of your emails directly to the inbox, bypassing spam filters through careful compliance with all email provider rules.

list.title: 1. We know how to bypass spam filters
list.description: Our strategies ensure email delivery straight to the inbox, even with the strictest providers.

list.title: 2. We build smart automation
list.description: We create effective automated systems that work continuously, ensuring maximum efficiency.

list.title: 3. We know what content engages the audience
list.description: We write emails that grab attention and motivate action, creating genuine interest.

list.title: 4. Cold email expertise
list.description: We have extensive experience with cold emails - having sent around 50k cold emails.

list.title: 5. We scrape your target audience contacts
list.description: We collect contact data from various platforms, giving us additional flexibility in campaign setup.

list.title: 6. We follow clear timelines
list.description: We spend a month preparing the system, warming up email accounts, and then launch the system to achieve results.

slide3.content: We are ready to help you achieve maximum results in email marketing

storage.title: PERSONAL DATA STORAGE PERIOD
storage.content: ADvantage Agency stores and processes personal data for an indefinite period to fulfill the purposes defined in the Policy or until receiving a request for personal data deletion.

cookies.title: USE OF COOKIES
cookies.content: ADvantage Agency uses cookies to remember browser type and operating system, the page from which the visitor came to the current one, path through pages on this site, internet provider domain in order to understand how Users use the site. ADvantage Agency uses cookies to remember User settings and preferences. Cookies are also used to improve site navigation and provide more relevant information to the User. By checking the appropriate 'consent box', you allow us to use cookies every time you use the ADvantage Agency website.

security.title: ENSURING CONFIDENTIALITY AND DATA SECURITY. GUARANTEES
security.content: ADvantage Agency guarantees full confidentiality, meaning not to disclose Confidential Information to third parties in any way and to use Confidential Information only for the purposes of providing ADvantage Agency's relevant Services to the User, results of Services provision, regardless of whether such information was disclosed voluntarily or otherwise obtained by ADvantage Agency as a result of providing Services to the User, until such information becomes publicly available by User's decision. ADvantage Agency guarantees that all necessary measures have been taken to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction using appropriate technical and organizational tools. We inform you that the information you provided is included in personal data databases owned by ADvantage Agency.

other.title: OTHER PROVISIONS
other.contact: If you have any questions about our Policy, you can contact us at the following email address:
other.disputes: Any disputes that may arise between the User and ADvantage Agency regarding relations covered by the provisions of this Policy shall be resolved in accordance with UK law. The User has the right to contact ADvantage Agency for peaceful dispute resolution with a corresponding application, by email to: contact@marketing-advantage.com, or by sending a letter to: 442 Saffron Lane 442 Saffron Lane, Leicester, England, LE2 6SB, email contact@marketing-advantage.com, phone +48793284320.
other.ageRestriction: The website https://advantage-agency.co/ is not intended and not designed for children under 14 years of age. Processing of personal data of minors aged 14 to 18 years is carried out only with the consent of parents (adoptive parents) or guardians.
other.complaint: If you have a complaint about any processing of your personal data, you can contact us.
other.updates: This Policy may be updated in the future to comply with national and international legislation governing personal data protection. All changes take effect from the moment of their publication. By continuing to use the website https://advantage-agency.co/, you confirm your agreement with the new terms of the Policy in the version current at the time of using the website https://advantage-agency.co/.

hero.subtitle: Automated outbound sales system for lead generation

title.part2: Choose infrastructure size for your business

how-it-works.subtitle: Our proven process to generate qualified leads and convert them into paying clients

steps.title: Learn and research your ideal customer.
steps.description: You fill out our onboarding questionnaire to help us learn about your ICP. We conduct additional research to gain insights into your targets' motivations and pain points. The goal? Putting the right message in front of the right person. Then we scrape this audience from all the channels tailored to your requirements.

steps.title: Building a relevant offer
steps.description: You don't need a crazy offer with money back guarantees. With your help and AI market research, we'll build a relevant, hyper-specific offer that resonates only with them and cut through the noise.

steps.title: Attention generation
steps.description: Regardless of how good your offer/service is, you need more eyeballs on it. Outbound is literally ads, but way cheaper and you can directly choose who you want to target. Each month to hit KPI's we're sending 5-10,000 new contacts each month.

steps.title: Sales/Conversions System
steps.description: It's easy to book calls. The hard part is actually converting, especially in this broken economy where your prospects have been burnt. We'll build you systems with sales assets & automated follow ups to make sure you close 20%+ of these calls.

process.subtitle: From strategy to execution in just 4 weeks

steps.title: System Preparation
steps.description: Preparing and optimizing email infrastructure for maximum deliverability.

steps.title: Scraping Target Audience
steps.description: Collecting and verifying contact information of your target audience.

steps.title: Contact Strategy Development
steps.description: Creating compelling email templates and configuring campaign structure.

steps.title: Campaign Setup and Launch
steps.description: Final setup of all processes and verification

testimonials.subtitle: See how we've helped agencies like yours achieve remarkable growth through our proven cold email strategies

items.name: Michael Anderson
items.text: Working with ADvantage has been transformative for our business. Their lead generation strategies helped us secure numerous high-value meetings, leading to multiple successful projects and significant revenue growth.

items.name: David Richardson
items.text: Stepan's expertise in lead generation is exceptional. His strategies helped us secure major contracts with key industry partners. I highly recommend his approach.

items.name: James Wilson
items.text: Stepan's B2B lead generation expertise is comprehensive - from strategy to execution. The knowledge he shares goes beyond basic outreach, and his strategic approach to tool integration saves significant resources.

items.name: Sarah Mitchell
items.text: I'm incredibly grateful to Advantage Agency for their expertise in mastering advanced prospecting techniques. Their professional guidance has been instrumental in elevating our outreach capabilities and lead generation results.

items.name: Emma Thompson
items.text: What sets Stepan apart is his strategic approach to lead generation. He avoids mass email tactics, focuses on personalization, and handles projects personally. His methodology consistently delivers results.

items.name: Robert Bennett
items.text: Thanks to Stepan's systematic approach, we've maintained a steady flow of 25-40 qualified leads monthly over the past 8 months. His data-driven methodology has transformed our lead generation process.

pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing options for your requirements

faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our cold email marketing service

items.question: What does the initial setup include?
items.answer: The initial setup includes campaign configuration, strategy development, email copywriting, contact database parsing, and campaign launch. All preparatory work necessary for successful email outreach.

items.question: How does your pricing work?
items.answer: Our pricing has two phases. The initial setup (first 2 months) includes complete preparation and campaign launch. After that, you can purchase additional services as needed.

items.question: What happens after the first two months of work?
items.answer: After completing the initial phase, you receive a fully functional cold outreach system. For continued operation, you'll need to update your contact database and optimize email messaging based on data collected from the previous month.

footer.description: We help marketing agencies book more qualified calls through our proven cold email system.
